channel.title: Shop Help
channel.description:
Well I was wondering how I could change the amount of runes a player buys. It says ten(Buy ten) but instead of 10 its 100 when bought.
Example-
You go to the rune shop, and you want 500 death runes. You right click it and click on the number ten and you get 100 death runes.
Well Thank You for the help.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 06, 2008, 06:39:39 PM[/size][hr]No Help?
